titles.title: Saving Privacy Act
Saving Privacy Act
To amend the Right to Financial Privacy Act of 1978 to preserve the confidentiality of certain records, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, Rules, the Budget, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
